verbs.description: Today , " evangelicals " [V: are] perceived by many as one more interest group attached to the Republican Party and especially President Trump .
[ARGM-TMP: Today] , " [ARG1: evangelicals] " are [V: perceived] [ARG0: by many] [ARG2: as one more interest group attached to the Republican Party and especially President Trump] .
Today , " evangelicals " are perceived by many as [ARG1: one more interest group] [V: attached] [ARG2: to the Republican Party and especially President Trump] .
